items.description: Stores local state associated with an application.

closed-out-at-round.description: Round when account closed out of the application.

deleted.description: Whether or not the application local state is currently deleted from its account.

id.description: The application which this local state is for.

key-value.description: Represents a key-value store for use in an application.

items.description: Represents a key-value pair in an application store.

type.description: type of the value. Value `1` refers to **bytes**, value `2` refers to **uint**

opted-in-at-round.description: Round when the account opted into the application.

schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.

current-round.description: Round at which the results were computed.

next-token.description: Used for pagination, when making another request provide this token with the next parameter.
